alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 10:03PM CDT until August 08 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kit Carson County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 903 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kanorado, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ruleton around 915 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 439 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 192 and 197. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
